# CHANGELOG
*versions follow [SemVer](http://semver.org)*

## 2.0.0 - 2019-09-25
**BREAKING CHANGE**:
* renamed `blackBright` -> `grey`
* renamed `bgBlackBright` -> `bgGrey`

## 1.0.0 - 2019-09-25
Forked from https://github.com/vzhufeng/helloChalk
**BREAKING CHANGE**:
* removed functions: `hex` and `bghex`
